name: SARVA SAMNVAYA SAMATHAA

address: Sakya 4th Cross, Near Boothappa Temple, Nagadevanahally, Jnana Bharati post, Kengeri

briefDescription: SARVA SAMNVAYA SAMATHAA is a non-profit organization that works on pro-social justice and sustainable development model. It focuses on vibrant research, access to justice, skill development and advocacy for bringing social change and development, especially for the welfare of the marginalized. The members of the organization work for the rights, as guaranteed under the Constitution of India; more particularly towards protection of rights of the marginalized, stigmatized and underprivileged communities by collaborating with different agencies and government institutions.

address: Near Boothappa Temple, Nagadevanahally, Jnana Bharati Post, Kengeri
